item.title: My first debian conf :)
item.description: I was so lucky to be able to attend this summer and helping the video team to accomplish some tasks! What is debian conf? DebConf is the Debian Project’s developer conference. Where Debian developers(DDs) came from everywhere. I wish I could contribute more and be more involved into the debian community next year in Brazil. What I have done? Basically I am doing some simple tasks like handing the camera(The camera operator), the guy who plays with the PA system(audio techinician), director(controlls which camera to feed into the live-stream) during the debconf.
